item.description:
Dale Chihuly's stunning glass sculptures are on exhibit at RISD. Chihuly incorporates the environment into his glass blowing -- creating beautiful glass flowers, vines, lily pads and other elements of nature. His work is exhibited at numerous museums, botanical gardens and other public places. One of his sculptures even hangs from the ceiling of the Bellagio in Las Vegas.

This is also an opportunity to see the RISD Museum's beautiful new Chace Center, at 20 South Main Street. Admission to the museum is "pay what you wish" on Sundays until 1 p.m.

Let's meet inside the entrance of the Chace Center at 11 a.m.

Learn more about Chihuly and see more photos of his work: http://www.chihuly.co....
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby -- Entrance on North Main St.
item.name: Chihuly Exhibit -- RISD
